org.pac4j.core.authorization

Interface AuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCasAuthorizationGenerator, FromAttributesAuthorizationGenerator

    public interface AuthorizationGenerator<U extends CommonProfile>
    Generate the authorization information for this user profile.
    Since:
    1.5.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generate(U profile)
      Generate the authorization information from and for the user profile.

        void generate(U profile)
        Generate the authorization information from and for the user profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - the user profile for which to generate the authorization information.
